title: Topic 001 Question 122
body: You need to issue a new server certificate because your old one is expiring. You need to avoid a restart of your Cloud SQL for MySQL instance. What should you do in your Cloud SQL instance?
options: Issue a rollback, and download your server certificate.
Create a new client certificate, and download it.
Create a new server certificate, and download it.
Reset your SSL configuration, and download your server certificate.
